name: LD01 LOUNGE CHAIR
description: Crafted by the visionary designer Luna Solis, the Cloudhaven Lounge defies traditional furniture. Its frame is constructed from a revolutionary material called nightshade, a bioluminescent wood that shimmers with an ethereal, twilight glow. This otherworldly wood is incredibly lightweight yet surprisingly strong, allowing the Cloudhaven to appear to float effortlessly.
